backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profile permissions plus static dispute category definitions with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Declares evidence for a feature adding a Gauri Jadhav footer credit, linking it to SiteLayout and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files including routing, layout, auth, guidance, chatbot, and role pages.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with SiteLayout, ThemeProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/DisputeCategoryS: UI for selecting a dispute category and fetching associated guidance with result display.
frontend/src/components/DisputeChatbotPa: Empty placeholder file for dispute chatbot panel component.
frontend/src/components/RecentDevelopmen: Dialog form to add or edit recent developments with validation and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Main layout with header, navigation, auth display, and responsive mobile menu using user profile and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hooks for fetching, saving user profiles, and checking admin status via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuidance.ts: Hooks to fetch dispute categories and request guidance results by category.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, logout, stored identity, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentDevelopments: Hooks for retrieving, adding, and editing recent development records.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining theme colors and accessibility rules.
frontend/src/lib/disputeCategories.ts: Static labels and metadata for dispute categories mapped to backend category types.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider around the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutMediationPage.ts: Displays an informational page about mediation in India, covering its definition, evolution, and benefits using cards and styled text.
frontend/src/pages/ComparisonPage.tsx: Renders a detailed comparison table of dispute resolution methods including mediation, litigation, arbitration, and negotiation.
frontend/src/pages/DisputeGuidancePage.t: Shows a guidance page with a disclaimer and a dispute category selector to help users assess mediation suitability.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero section and role-based navigation cards linking users to tailored mediation information.
Provides simple and detailed step-by-step explanations of the mediation process using tabbed content.
frontend/src/pages/RecentDevelopmentsPag: Fetches and displays recent mediation-related developments with admin editing capabilities and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/roles/CommonPersonPag: A page explaining the role, expectations, and rights of parties in mediation, with lists and descriptive sections. Includes guidance on preparation and participation.
frontend/src/pages/roles/JudgePage.tsx: A page outlining judges’ responsibilities in mediation referrals, key considerations, and benefits of directing cases to mediation.
frontend/src/pages/roles/LawyerPage.tsx: A page describing lawyers’ advisory role in mediation, their duties, and ethical considerations, along with preparation guidance for clients.
frontend/src/pages/roles/MediatorPage.ts: A page detailing mediators’ responsibilities, required skills, and principles of neutrality and impartiality in the mediation process.
frontend/src/pages/roles/StudentPage.tsx: A page introducing mediation education for students, listing learning opportunities and potential mediation-related career paths.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, storing and retrieving them from sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, requirements, architectural notes, and feature list for the mediation website.
